name: src/js/03_base.js
Screen
MODE_ROOT
description:
Root scren mode. This mode will disable open/close animations.
See `Screen.setMode(mode)`.

name: AB_MODE_HIDE
description:
Actionbar scroll mode: hide on scroll.
See `Screen.setScrollMode(mode)`.

name: AB_MODE_NONE
description:
Actionbar scroll mode: do not hide on scroll.
See `Screen.setScrollMode(mode)`.

params.name: data
params.description: Anything taht you want give for `onCreate` method

name: _refresh_timer
description: SetInterval return code for timer reset

name: _ab_scrollmod
description:
Current action bar scroll mode.
See `Screen.setScrollMode(mode)`

name: setScrollMode
description:
Set action bar behavior on page scroll.

Use `Screen.AB_MODE_*` constants to provide mode.
Default mode is `AB_MODE_NONE`.

name: _ab_scrolltrg
description: Calls on scroll to provide ActionBar scroll mode

name: addLeftIcon
description: Add icon to left action bar zone

name: wipeActions
description: Remove all actions from action bar

name: addRightIcon
description: Add icon to right action bar zone

name: setHomeAction
description: Use item as screen home action.

name: setHomeAsUpAction
description: Enable back button as home action.

name: setTitle
description: Set screen title in action bar

name: doAutoUpdate
description: Add automatic call to `onUpdate` in interval
todo: Remove old timer before install new

name: appendView
description:
Append view to screen.

If `view.IS_FIXED_VIEW == true`, view will be added to relative zone.

name: setMode
description:
Set activity mode.

Use `Screen.MODE_*` constants to set mode.
Default mode is `MODE_DEFAULT` (0).

name: getScrollerBlock
description:
Returns scrolling block from activity.
Used to setup onScroll listeners.

name: wipeContents
description: Remove all activity contents, except config and fixed views

name: onCreate
description: Event listener, calls on screen start

name: onUpdate
description: Event listener, calls on screen refresh or manually

name: onInit
description: Event listener, calls before screen construct

name: onFinish
description:
Event listener, calls on screen destroy. Must return a boolean.

If returns `false`, screen finish will be cancelled.

name: MenuItem
description: This class provide items for actionbar

name: setType

name: RowView
description: Row widget, great way to provide item in list

name: setSummary
description: Set item summary, second level information

name: SubHeader
description: SubHeader is view (widget) that provides list separator with title.

name: setText
description: Set text to display on button.
